dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form
Class DCtxtTreeviewer

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.DCtxtTreeviewer

public class DCtxtTreeviewer
extends java.lang.Object

The create(Composite) creates and returns a composite which shows DCtxt in a tree (in the same way, the search view does it).

Method Detail

create

public org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control create(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Creates a tree which shows the DCtxts (given in into the constructor). Additionally, some useful icons are shown at the top of the tree

Parameters:
parent - the parent composite to create the tree
Returns:
the newly created control (a Composite which surrounds the tree and the icons)

setInput

public void setInput(DCtxt[] ctxts)
Parameters:
ctxts - the configuration nodes which shall be shown
